TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FederatedPassiveSecurityTokenServiceOperations extends System.Object

summary.span: 公共类封装操作通常由 Federated Passive Security Token Service 执行。

span.span: A utility class that encapsulates the operations typically performed by a Federated Passive Security Token Service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现被动 security token service (STS) 时，请从代码隐藏调用此类公开的静态方法，以调用自定义 STS 的实例来处理传入的 WS 联合身份验证请求消息。When implementing a passive security token service (STS), call the static methods exposed by this class from your code-behind to invoke an instance of your custom STS to process an incoming WS-Federation request message. 通过从类派生来实现自定义 STS 。You implement a custom STS by deriving from the class. ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，这些类可用于处理 (SWT) 的简单 Web 令牌，并且它包括可为 SWT 令牌提供服务的被动 STS 的实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT), and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例的信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). 下面的代码演示如何通过 从文件中的代码调用方法来调用自定义被动 STS 来处理 WS 联合身份验证请求 `default.aspx.cs` 。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

summary.span: 处理传入 WS-Federation Passive Protocol 请求。

span.span: Processes an incoming WS-Federation Passive Protocol request.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，这些类可用于处理 (SWT) 的简单 Web 令牌，并且它包括可为 SWT 令牌提供服务的被动 STS 的实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT), and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例的信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). 下面的代码演示如何通过 从文件中的代码调用方法来调用自定义被动 STS 来处理 WS 联合身份验证请求 `default.aspx.cs` 。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的典型用法是处理 从重载方法之一返回的 。This typical usage of this method is to process the returned from one of the overloaded methods.
